item.title: OpenAI 推出价值 200 美元的用于研究的 ChatGPT 订阅服务
item.description: OpenAI 周四推出了一款广受欢迎的聊天机器人 ChatGPT，售价为每月 200 美元，可用于工程领域和研究，这家人工智能公司希望扩大其技术的行业应用。【原文：OpenAI on Thursday launched a version of its popular chatbot ChatGPT priced at $200 per month, which can be used in engineering fields and for research, as the AI firm looks to expand industry applications for its technology.】

item.title: UnitedHealth 高管遇害后，医疗行业重新思考风险问题
item.description: 联合健康保险公司（UnitedHealthcare）首席执行官布莱恩-汤普森（Brian Thompson）周三在曼哈顿遇害后，健康保险公司正在重新评估其高层管理人员的风险，枪击事件发生后，联合健康保险公司和竞争对手 CVS Health 都从其网站上删除了领导团队的照片。【原文：Health insurance companies are reassessing the risks for their top executives after the murder of UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson on Wednesday in Manhattan, with both UnitedHealth and rival CVS Health removing photos of their leadership teams from their websites after the shooting.】

item.title: 美国联邦通信委员会主席针对中国 "盐台风 "电信黑客事件提出网络安全规则建议
item.description: 美国联邦通信委员会主席杰西卡-罗森沃塞尔（Jessica Rosenworcel）在周四的一份声明中表示，该机构建议要求通信服务提供商每年提交一份证明，证明他们已经制定了防范网络攻击的计划。 该提议部分是为了应对中国被称为 "盐台风"（Salt Typhoon）的网络攻击。【原文：U.S. Federal Communications Commission Chairwoman Jessica Rosenworcel is proposing that communications service providers be required to submit an annual certification attesting that they have a plan in place to protect against cyberattacks, the agency said in a statement on Thursday. The proposal is in part in response to China's alleged efforts known as Salt Typhoon to burrow deep into American t】

item.title: GameStop 股价大涨，因为 "咆哮的凯蒂猫 "的神秘帖子引发了零售商的兴趣
item.description: 基思-吉尔（Keith Gill）在网上发表了一篇隐晦的帖子，并看好这家视频游戏零售商，引发了普通投资者的交易狂潮。【原文：GameStop's shares jumped on Thursday after a cryptic post from meme stock influencer Keith Gill, who shot to notoriety after his online personas and bullish bets on the video game retailer sparked a trading frenzy among mom-and-pop investors.】

item.title: 马斯克的 xAI 获得约 60 亿美元股权融资
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的人工智能初创公司 xAI 周四表示，该公司已筹集到约 60 亿美元的股权融资。【原文：Elon Musk's artificial intelligence startup xAI said on Thursday it has raised around $6 billion in equity financing.】

item.title: 最新数据显示美国非农就业基准修正值不再那么剧烈，但仍为负值
item.description: 周四更新的数据显示，对美国非农就业人数的年度基准修正可能会显示，在截至3月份的12个月里，美国经济新增就业岗位减少了约66.8万个，而不是最初估计的81.8万个。【原文：Annual benchmark revisions to U.S. nonfarm payrolls are likely to show the economy added about 668,000 fewer jobs in the 12 months through March, instead of the initially estimated 818,000, updated data suggested on Thursday.】

item.title: Stellantis 与 Zeta Energy 同意联合开发锂硫电动汽车电池
item.description: Stellantis公司与美国Zeta能源公司周四表示，两家公司已签署一项协议，共同开发用于电动汽车的廉价锂硫电池，目标是到2030年使用这种电池。【原文：Stellantis has signed an agreement with U.S.-based Zeta Energy to develop cheap lithium-sulfur batteries for electric vehicles, with an aim to use them by 2030, the two companies said on Thursday.】

item.title: Meta 与詹姆斯-卡梅隆的科技企业合作，促进混合现实内容的发展
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司周四表示，该公司已与电影导演詹姆斯-卡梅隆（James Cameron）的技术风险投资公司 Lightstorm Vision 合作，为 Meta Quest 增强 3D 娱乐的制作，包括现场体育、音乐会和电视剧。【原文：Meta Platforms said on Thursday it has partnered with film director James Cameron's technology venture Lightstorm Vision to enhance the creation of 3D entertainment, including live sports, concerts and TV series, for the Meta Quest.】

item.title: 被害首席执行官布莱恩-汤普森（Brian Thompson）领导的联合健康保险公司（UnitedHealthcare）的业务是什么？
item.description: 周三上午，联合健康（UnitedHealth）保险部门首席执行官布莱恩-汤普森（Brian Thompson）在曼哈顿中城遭到致命枪击，警方称这是一起有针对性的袭击，袭击者蒙面潜伏在希尔顿酒店，就在母公司召开年度投资者会议之前。【原文：Brian Thompson, the CEO of UnitedHealth's insurance unit, was fatally shot in Midtown Manhattan on Wednesday morning in what police described as a targeted attack by a masked assailant lying in wait just before the parent company's annual investor conference at a Hilton Hotel.】

item.title: 在斯泰兰特领导层动荡之际，欧宝对电动战略充满信心
item.description: 欧宝首席执行官卡洛斯-塔瓦雷斯（Carlos Tavares）周四告诉路透社，尽管首席执行官突然离职，但欧宝将继续充当Stellantis电动汽车的先锋。【原文：Opel will continue its role as the electric vehicle pioneer for Stellantis despite the sudden departure of CEO Carlos Tavares, the German brand's CEO told Reuters on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国法官驳回波音公司就致命空难达成的认罪协议
item.description: 一名美国联邦法官周四驳回了波音公司在两起致命的 法庭文件显示。【原文：A U.S. federal judge on Thursday rejected Boeing's agreement to plead guilty to fraud in the wake of two fatal 737 MAX crashes, court documents showed.】

item.title: 纽约联储分析称，特朗普首个任期内征收的关税损害了美国企业的利益
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行工作人员的最新分析得出结论，在当选总统唐纳德-特朗普的第一个任期内，进口关税在公布当天广泛降低了股票价值，并且与股票价格受打击最严重的公司的未来利润、销售和就业下降有关。【原文：Import tariffs during President-elect Donald Trump's first term broadly lowered stock values on the day they were unveiled, and were associated with lower future profits, sales and employment for the firms whose equity prices were hit the hardest, new analysis by Federal Reserve Bank of New York staff concluded.】

item.title: 大众汽车工人加强罢工，反对关闭德国工厂
item.description: 大众汽车公司工会周四发表声明称，该公司工人将于下周一举行长期罢工，加剧与管理层在裁员问题上的激烈争执，这将是欧洲最大的汽车制造商在德国本土关闭的第一家工厂。【原文：Volkswagen workers will go on extended strikes on Monday, stepping up a bitter dispute with management over layoffs and what would be the first factory closures on German soil for Europe's largest carmaker, a union statement said on Thursday.】

item.title: 联合健康高管布莱恩-汤普森（Brian Thompson）谋杀案：关于枪击案和嫌犯的已知信息
item.description: 纽约市警方仍在搜捕周三早些时候在曼哈顿中城一家酒店外杀害联合健康高管布莱恩-汤普森（Brian Thompson）的男子。以下是关于这起事件、汤普森和嫌疑人的已知信息：【原文：New York City police were still searching for the man who killed UnitedHealth executive Brian Thompson outside a Midtown Manhattan hotel early Wednesday. Here is what is known about the incident, Thompson, and the suspect:】

item.title: 埃隆-马斯克将特朗普推动的 "政府效率 "带到国会山
item.description: 亿万富翁埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）和前总统候选人维韦克-拉马斯瓦米（Vivek Ramaswamy）周四会见了共和党议员。【原文：Billionaire Elon Musk and former presidential candidate Vivek Ramaswamy met on Thursday with Republican lawmakers whose support they will need to win the sweeping spending cuts that President-elect Donald Trump has asked them to find.】

item.title: 英特尔在寻找首席执行官之际任命两位芯片业资深人士进入董事会
item.description: 英特尔周四任命了两位芯片业资深人士进入董事会，这家陷入困境的半导体公司在帕特-盖尔辛格（Pat Gelsinger）最近下台后正在寻找新的顶头上司，并试图找回失去的辉煌。【原文：Intel on Thursday named two chip industry veterans to its board, as the struggling semiconductor firm looks for a new top boss following the recent ouster of Pat Gelsinger and tries to reclaim its lost glory.】

item.title: 解说员：欧佩克+目前实施了哪些石油减产措施？
item.description: 欧佩克+在 12 月 5 日的会议上进一步修改了石油生产政策，将增产计划进一步推迟到明年，因为该组织面临着石油需求疲软的前景。【原文：OPEC+ at its Dec. 5 meeting made further changes to its oil production policy, by delaying a planned increase in output further into next year as it faces a weaker oil demand outlook.】

item.title: 消息人士称，花旗并购老将凯里-科赫曼（Cary Kochman）将退休
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士周四告诉路透社，花旗集团顶级交易员之一卡里-科赫曼（Cary Kochman）即将退休，此前他在这家华尔街银行的并购部门掌舵近 14 年。【原文：Cary Kochman, one of Citigroup's top dealmakers, is retiring after spending nearly 14 years at the helm of the Wall Street bank's mergers and acquisitions group, people familiar with the matter told Reuters on Thursday.】

item.title: 文件显示马里对巴里克黄金公司首席执行官发出逮捕令
item.description: 路透社周四看到的一份逮捕令文件显示，非洲最大的黄金生产国之一马里已对巴里克黄金公司（Barrick Gold）首席执行官马克-布里斯托（Mark Bristow）发出逮捕令，从而使与这家加拿大矿业公司的争端升级。【原文：Mali, one of Africa's biggest gold producers, has issued an arrest warrant for Barrick Gold Chief Executive Mark Bristow, a warrant document seen on Thursday by Reuters showed, escalating a dispute with the Canadian mining company.】

item.title: 沃达丰与三巨头合并获批标志着英国反垄断法的转变
item.description: 英国决定允许四家移动网络中的两家合并，这是第一个重要迹象，表明监管机构已经接受了政府的愿望，即优先考虑经济增长和基础设施投资，而不是降低消费者价格。【原文：Britain's decision to allow two of its four mobile networks to merge is the first big sign that regulators have taken on board the government's wish for them to prioritise economic growth and infrastructure investment over lower consumer prices.】

item.title: 调查显示，电动汽车和插电式混合动力汽车的可靠性问题有所缓解，但仍落后于燃油汽车
item.description: 美国一家有影响力的非营利组织周四进行的一项调查显示，电动汽车和插电式混合动力汽车对其可靠性的担忧有所缓解，但仍落后于汽油车。【原文：Electric vehicles and plug-in hybrids are seeing concerns over their reliability easing but they still lag gas-powered vehicles, a survey by an influential U.S. non-profit organization showed on Thursday.】

item.title: Alphabet 旗下 Waymo 将把打车服务扩展到迈阿密
item.description: Alphabet 旗下的 Waymo 公司周四表示，将把自动驾驶打车服务扩展到佛罗里达州迈阿密，为其业务再添一座城市，以求在竞争日益激烈的市场中获得优势。【原文：Alphabet's Waymo said on Thursday it will expand its autonomous ride-hailing services to Miami, Florida, adding another city to its operations as it seeks to gain an edge in an increasingly competitive market.】

item.title: 独家新闻知情人士透露，瘦肉精生产商 Conagra 正在探索出售 Chef Boyardee
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Slim Jim 牛肉干和 Healthy Choice 速冻食品的制造商 Conagra Brands 正在寻求出售其广受欢迎的罐装意大利面品牌 Chef Boyardee。【原文：Conagra Brands , the maker of Slim Jim beef jerky and Healthy Choice frozen meals, is looking to sell its popular canned pasta brand Chef Boyardee, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国贸易逆差因进口下降而缩小
item.description: 10 月份，美国贸易赤字大幅缩减，进口降幅为 2022 年末以来最大，这有可能使贸易在第四季度为经济增长做出贡献。【原文：The U.S. trade deficit contracted sharply in October as imports declined by the most since late 2022, potentially positioning trade to contribute to economic growth in the fourth quarter.】

item.title: 调查显示：风险重回主权基金和公共基金的菜单
item.description: 官方货币和金融机构论坛的一项调查显示，随着对通胀的担忧从最关注的问题中消失，管理着6.5万亿美元资金的主权基金和公共基金正在将风险重新列入菜单，并对印度下了大赌注。【原文：Sovereign and public funds managing $6.5 trillion are putting risk back on the menu as inflation fears fall from the list of top concerns, and are betting big on India, a survey from the Official Monetary and Financial Institutions Forum showed.】

item.title: 人工智能初创公司 Cohere 将在企业推广中优先考虑定制模型而非大型模型
item.description: 加拿大人工智能初创公司 Cohere 上一次估值为 55 亿美元，该公司告诉路透社，它将专注于为企业用户建立量身定制的模型，而不是大型基础模型。【原文：Canadian AI startup Cohere, last valued at $5.5 billion, will focus on building tailored models for enterprise users over larger foundation models, the company told Reuters.】

item.title: 意大利初创公司 iGenius 与 Nvidia 携手打造大型人工智能系统
item.description: 意大利初创公司iGenius和英伟达（Nvidia）周四表示，他们计划于明年年中在意大利南部的一个数据中心上线部署全球最大的英伟达（Nvidia）最新服务器。【原文：Italian startup iGenius and Nvidia on Thursday said they are planning to bring online one of the world's biggest deployments of Nvidia's newest servers by the middle of next year in a data center in southern Italy.】

item.title: 博通公司推出新技术，在 GenAI 需求不断增长的情况下加快定制芯片的速度
item.description: 博通公司（Broadcom）周四表示，其定制芯片部门为云服务提供商制造人工智能处理器，该部门已开发出新技术来提高半导体速度，以满足对生成式人工智能基础设施不断升级的需求。【原文：Broadcom said on Thursday its custom chip unit, which makes AI processors for cloud providers, has developed new technology to enhance semiconductor speeds amid escalating demand for generative artificial intelligence infrastructure.】

item.title: 美国每周申请失业救济人数温和上升
item.description: 上周新申请失业救济金的美国人数量略有增加，表明劳动力市场继续稳步降温。【原文：The number of Americans filing new applications for unemployment benefits increased moderately last week, suggesting that the labor market continued to steadily cool.】

item.title: 美国航空公司上调第四季度调整后盈利预期
item.description: 美国航空公司（American Airlines）周四上调了第四季度调整后盈利预期，认为旅游需求有望恢复，定价能力将全面提高。【原文：American Airlines lifted it fourth-quarter adjusted earnings forecast on Thursday, banking on resilient travel demand and an overall improvement in pricing power.】
